column2: "Oh, I'm in big trouble now! If only I had someone who's full of good ideas to help me... Oh!"
"You must have overheard me! See, I want to make a mascot for the Halloween event. It has to be cute!"

"But I didn't have a plan, so what I've created doesn't have any spark to it! I don't know what to do...
I'm really in trouble now."
"I hate to keep coming to you for help, but do you have any ideas?"
